practicalLocations.name: AFRICAN_LOCATIONS
practicalLocations.description: Fees for 25 shoot days and 5 prep days in remote wildlife-sensitive areas. Includes national park access, conservation fees, and community compensation.

studioFacilities.name: MGM_STUDIOS_BOREHAMWOOD
studioFacilities.description: Block booking of 8 stages for a total of 141 days (120 shoot + 21 prep). Includes basic power and backlot access. Rate reflects long-term lockout.

holdDays.description: All hold days are included within the long-term studio block booking fee.

international.description: Filming permits, work visas for 135 international personnel (cast/crew) in Kenya/Tanzania, and customs/carnet processing fees.

uk.description: Permits for large-scale, mechanically complex set construction, special effects (pyrotechnics), and local council liaison for London-based activities.

aviation.description: Permits for filming access and coordination at an active airfield/airport for 5 days.

security.description: High-level security detail. Includes 24/7 on-set security at the studio to protect pioneering set construction and a specialized team for remote/wildlife security in Africa.

transportation.description: International sea/air freight for equipment, ATA Carnet administration, local 4x4 vehicle fleet in Africa, and a full fleet of crew/cast transport vehicles in the UK.

accommodation.description: Accommodation for 35 weeks. Includes hotels/apartments for 225 cast/crew in London and full-board safari camp/lodge lodging for 135 cast/crew in Africa.

facilities.description: Temporary infrastructure. Includes remote power generation, satellite communications, and mobile medical unit in Africa. In the UK, covers production office rental, parking lots, catering setup, and location restoration bond.

animalWork.description: Cost for lead animal wranglers, wildlife experts for African shoot, and on-set safety coordinators for scenes involving animals.

customConstruction.description: Pioneering construction budget for large-scale, historically significant sets. Reflects 1960s-era challenges with modern cost equivalency. Primary cost drivers: 1. Centrifuge Set (Design, Engineering, Fabrication, Motors, Certification) - $7.5M. 2. Space Station & Other Sets (Rotating sections, Discovery interior, Moon Base) - $4.5M.

internationalLogistics.description: Fees for local fixers, translators, cultural consultants, and legal advisors for operations in Kenya/Tanzania.
